GamePlayer  0.1.0
A game player for two-player perfect information games, implemented using a min-max game tree

Member Function Documentation

◆ fingerprint()

virtual uint64_t GamePlayer::GameState::fingerprint ( ) const
pure virtual

Returns a fingerprint for this state.

Returns
The fingerprint of the state
Note
The fingerprint is assumed to be statistically unique.
This function must be overridden.

std::vector< GamePlayer::GameState *> &  responses 
) const
pure virtual

Generates a list of all possible responses to this state.

Parameters
depthThe depth of the current ply
responsesThe list of returned responses
Note
The caller gains ownership of the returned states.
This function must be overridden.
